itemData.name: Frosty Flying Carpet
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Frosty Flying Carpet
Binds when picked up
Requires Level 70
Requires Tailoring (425)
Requires Artisan Riding
Use: Teaches you how to summon this rug. Can only be summoned in Outland or Northrend. This is a very fast rug.
1 Charge

itemData.name: Flying Carpet
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Flying Carpet
Requires Level 60
Requires Tailoring (300)
Requires Expert Riding
Use: Teaches you how to summon this rug. Can only be used in Outland or Northrend.
1 Charge
